full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

Hi Rebecca,

You are most welcome. 

This approach means there can be a parent page, but it isn't essential. You can choose to have one if there is a benefit for navigation, SEO etc. 

The group classes would appear in the dashboard menu in a position of your choosing - as shown by the screenshot attached.

I think that would work, then there would be a parent page similar to how Services has the parent page that pulls through all the services like https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/petersham/services/ - and would have its own dedicated Breakdance template?

Preferably they would show up in the same place as the other pages if possible, we are looking at implementing blogs across the various locations so would be using Posts being tagged by location for those and don't want to cause confusion.



Thanks for your help Chris!

Rebecca Broom​​​​

Senior Graphic Designer

M 0466 668 276

|

E Rebecca.Broom@royalrehab.com.au

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St Milsons Point NSW 2061

royalrehabgroup.com.au





I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Rebecca,

Sorry for the delay, I wanted to speak to the devs before I sent this off. 

Great to speak about all things "group classes". As mentioned, below is a quick recap of how we can resolve the group classes and ensure future updates are quick/easy without editing single posts/pages.

Recommendation: Create a new post called "group-classes". These will allow group classes to be created/updated quickly via the back end of the website. Each group class can be allocated to a single or multiple locations as needed allowing for variations according to location. E.g. Hydrotherapy is Cairns may be a smaller group than in Penrith. 

This would reduce the number of new pages/urls added to the website and avoid hijacking the services custom post type. 

Please let me know your thoughts and we'll plan accordingly.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

For the extra tab, you can see here that the guys are using the "I'm interested, what do I need to do next" tab for information about each individual group class. This only works if there are 4 or less classes so it isn't very future proof.



For Cairns they started with more than 4 classes and was set up a bit differently where the group classes didn't have their own pages so I manually put in a section on the Services template that showed the times the classes run and an icon for each, and a smaller "costs" piece. I'd like to be able to have that on the other group classes pages but have them link to their individual pages rather than the .pdfs that Cairns has currently.



You can see the different sections here in the global block template: https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/?breakdance=builder&id=408

Ideally, something that works for all locations rather than having to have multiple hidden sections on the services template would be ideal, as most locations now have the group classes happening and it's getting a bit messy. Whether this is best as a separate template for group classes or just a tab on the services template I will leave up to you!

Let me know if you'd like to organise a time to jump on a Teams call if it's still not clear and we can run you through it.

Cheers,

Rebecca Broom​​​​

Senior Graphic Designer

M 0466 668 276

|

E Rebecca.Broom@royalrehab.com.au

Suite 10.01, Level 10, 52 Alfred St Milsons Point NSW 2061

royalrehabgroup.com.au





I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Ella,

We've created the Group Classes page for Penrith, but it's currently in draft as we're still working on it.

Could you please elaborate on your request for a separate tab in the services? We'd like to ensure we understand your needs fully.

Looking forward to your reply.
@jaime can you please add this in the Penrith pages as well?

Hi @rica I already added Group Classes in main nav in Penrith but it was saved as draft , let me know what are the pages we need to add in group class in penrith


Time: +10mins

Thanks for doing this.

We also require the Group Classes option for Penrith LifeWorks.

I have cloned the Group Class page from Collaroy into Penrith but it is not coming up as a Group Class option.

Please can you assist.

Thanks

Ella

They won't all have a .pdf link some would be pages so the ability to edit the cta text link as well would be fab. The template is here: https://royalrehablifeworks.com.au/?breakdance=builder&id=408 and screenshot of the section I mean below. Let me know if this is possible! At the moment we are hacking the "I'm interested, what's next" section but would like to avoid that if possible..



Thanks again!
